name: Cover Story
description:
You are the super hero Wonder, and you've saved the day many times over. Unfortunately, most of those times have been at the expense of hanging out with your best friend.

You've finally found the time to meet with them, but they want to know what you've been up to. How will you explain yourself without letting your secret slip?

I've included the Twine Code if you want to see it, but oh boy is it messy. Performance might be a concern, but I mean, it's a Twine game, so hopefully not. 

This was a solo project for the Fall Proto Game Jam 2019 at UCI. The Theme was Secrets.
